title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip feature is taking a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during the update process.
OB: Currently, there is no indication that the update is happening, and it takes a long time for the checked state of the table to be updated.
EB: A busy cursor should be shown during the update process, providing a visual indication and feedback to the user. This will improve the user experience and give them confidence that the update is being performed.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Export Zip feature. 2. Check some checkboxes in the table and observe the lack of a busy cursor. 3. Wait for the table to update and notice that it takes a long time. 4. Add a busy cursor to the update process and verify that it is shown during the update.
